### User Story
```
As a(n) <role or type of user>
I want to <accomplish some task>
So that <some benefit from doing so>
```

### Acceptance Criteria: 
- [ ] Satisfies this requirement
- [ ] Satisfies this requirement
- [ ] Satisfies this requirement

### Tasks:
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3
